snippet: Israel’s announcement this week that it was building over 1,000 housing units in East Jerusalem and the West Bank appeared to be partly a move to satisfy many Israelis before it released 26 Palestinian prisoners.
abstract: Israel’s announcement that it is building over 1,000 housing units in East Jerusalem and West Bank appear to be partly a move to satisfy many Israelis before it releases 26 Palestinian prisoners.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Israel’s announcement this week that it was building over 1,000 housing units in East Jerusalem and the West Bank appeared to be partly a move to satisfy many Israelis before it released 26 Palestinian prisoners.

headline.main: Timing of Israeli Housing Plans May Be Part of a Political Calculation
headline.print_headline: Timing of Israeli Housing Plans May Be Part of a Political Calculation
